In contrast to previous models,
5, 17 competition between normal cells and LCs is described only implicitly, by assuming constant total cell numbers, T Y , T X , T W in each cell compartment ( Figure 1D, Online Supplementary Text S1 and Online Supplementary Figure S2 complementing Figure 1C on the level of absolute cell numbers). The actual tumor load, corresponding to BCR-ABL1 levels, is modeled as the percentage of LCs with respect to the total cell number. Figure 1C demonstrates that the modeled BCR-ABL1 levels of proliferating LSCs behave exactly like the BCR-ABL1 levels in the peripheral blood (PB). Therefore, only the dynamics of proliferating LSCs will be considered.
